item.description:
Beer Advocate's Belgian Beer Fest is right around the corner. So, that creates the perfect excuse - no, reason! - to head on over to a great place in Brookline to "prepare" for this year's big Belgian blowout. So, what do you say? Even if you're not entirely convinced Belgian ales are your friend, come on out anyway. This meetup location offers a great selection of American crafts, too. (And if you're hungry, I hear their food is delicious, too. Especially the mac 'n cheese.)

Hope to see you there!

(And because Publick House can get crammed and they require your entire party to be present before they seat you, let's keep this gathering to a minimum of 10. So do RSVP early if you can make it!)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try and arrive early to up our name in for a table.
item.name: Get Your Belgian On
